name: Combined Demo
description: A comprehensive showcase combining graphics, music, sound, and effects into a single cohesive experience. Entries should demonstrate technical and artistic skills while dazzling audiences with innovation and creativity.

name: Prerendered Music
description: Professional quality music compositions, from electronic beats to classical pieces and band recordings. Emphasizes originality and production quality in professionally mixed and mastered tracks.

name: Tracked Music
description: Music created using tracker software like MilkyTracker or FastTracker, combining samples and patterns within technical constraints. Perfect for both nostalgic chiptunes and modern tracked compositions.

name: Freestyle Graphics
description: Unrestricted artistic expression encompassing hand-drawn illustrations, photo manipulation, pixel art, and 3D renders. Showcases creative process and unique artistic style.

name: Oldschool Graphics
description: Low-resolution artwork created under classic technical constraints (max 320x200, 8-bit colors). Celebrates the charm and technical mastery of retro graphics creation.

name: Freestyle Photo
description: Photography focused on composition, lighting, and timing with minimal editing allowed. Celebrates the artistry of capturing perfect moments through the lens.

name: Stop Motion
description: Frame-by-frame animations that blend meticulous planning with creative storytelling. Perfect for artists crafting dynamic sequences that can range from playful to dramatic.

name: Wild / Animation
description: A category for experimental animations, music videos, and entries that defy traditional categories. Welcomes innovative formats and unconventional approaches to digital creativity.
